description: Explore how Arbitrum, a forefront Layer-2 solution using Optimistic Rollup, enhances blockchain scalability, speed, and security by improving data availability. Understand its features like the fraud proof system and smart contract compatibility, and discover solutions like Zero-Knowledge Proofs and Data Availability Committees addressing data challenges essential for decentralized applications.
keywords: Arbitrum, Layer-2 solutions, blockchain scalability, data availability, Optimistic Rollup, Ethereum, decentralized, Zero-Knowledge Proofs, security, Offchain Labs
title: Arbitrum and Data Availability: Enhancing Layer-2 Solutions for the Blockchain Revolution
